short_description: 150+ banned colors, flavors, preservatives and other ingredients often found in food

product_description: Ever broken your chip in a dip before? Or watched in dismay as half of your chip fell back to your loaded-nachos plate? Yeah, it’s kind of guac-ward. These grain free tortilla chips are exactly what they sound like: a thick chip built to withstand even the heartiest of dips. Made from the same savory pumpkin and cassava masa as our taco shells, but they resemble traditional restaurant-style tortilla chips. So nice, you might even dip it twice.

name: Late July Sea Salt Organic Tortilla Chips, 10.1 Oz Bag
short_description: Includes one (1) 10.1-ounce bag of Late July sea salt organic tortilla chips
Perfectly salted organic tortilla chips are rolled thin and made for sharing
Melt-in-your-mouth, thin & crispy chips
USDA certified organic, non-GMO project verified, certified gluten-free, vegan
Amazingly delicious, feel good snacks
product_description: Let the good times roll with Late July Snacks Thin and Crispy Organic Tortilla Chips with Sea Salt. These restaurant style tortilla chips are made to be shared, with a melt-in-your-mouth, thin and crispy texture that’s the perfect complement to authentic salsa. Crafted with organic whole ground corn and perfectly seasoned with sea salt, our corn tortilla chips contain only the finest ingredients, with no artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. In addition to being USDA Certified Organic, they’re also Non-GMO Project Verified, Certified Gluten Free, vegan and kosher. Enjoy these amazingly delicious, gluten free tortilla chips on their own, dip them in salsa, queso or guacamole, or use them to make nachos, taco salad and more. Each 10.1-ounce bag contains 10 servings and is perfect for sharing with friends or snacking alone. At Late July, we believe the best gatherings only need a few simple ingredients: good friends, good stories and great food. For us, that means a big bowl of our thin tortilla chips and salsa. In addition to Sea Salt, Late July organic chips are also available in Sea Salt and Lime, Chia and Quinoa, and more. Late July is the sweet spot of summer. It’s a moment in time when life is simple, pure and good. And Late July tortilla chips take you there, any time of the year! Try Late July organic snacks today.

name: Late July Snacks, Garden Ranch Tortilla Chips, 7.8-oz. Bag
short_description: Inspired ranch flavor: chips flavored with buttermilk, garlic, onion and dill
Non-GMO tortilla chips: non-GMO project verified
Feel-good snack: certified gluten free, kosher
100% whole grain: made with organic whole ground yellow corn
About 8 servings per bag: about 8 servings per 7.8-oz. bag of Late July tortilla chips
Boldly seasoned: big, bold, delicious tortilla chips
product_description: Get ready for the big bold flavor of new Late July Garden Ranch Tortilla Chips. They’re made with organic whole ground yellow corn and seasoned with the perfect blend of buttermilk, garlic, onion and the fresh taste of dill for a deliciously bold chip that you can enjoy right out of the bag. We hope you’ll love them as much as we do. Late July is the sweet spot of summer. It’s a moment in time when life is simple, pure and good. And our chips take you there, any time of year. It’s also our name and our snack-making philosophy. Since 2003, we have been obsessed with crafting the world’s most delicious snacks with only the finest organic and Non-GMO Project Verified ingredients. Our 100% whole-grain chips are made with organic yellow corn, are certified gluten free and contain no artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. There are about 8 servings per 7.8-oz. bag of Late July Tortilla Chips. Thanks for snacking with us.

name: Simply Nature Organic Yellow Corn Tortilla Chips, 11 oz (312g) | Gluten-free, Non-GMO, No Artificial Flavors or Colors
short_description: Wholesome Ingredients: Crafted with high-quality, natural ingredients, ensuring a delicious and satisfying snack option.
Certified Organic: Certified organic by reputable organizations, guaranteeing that the product meets strict standards for organic production.
Gluten-Free: Free from gluten, making them suitable for individuals with gluten sensitivities or those following a gluten-free diet.
Authentic Flavor: Offers an authentic taste of traditional tortilla chips, with a satisfying crunch and robust flavor.
product_description: Introducing Simply Nature Organic Yellow Corn Tortilla Chips, a delicious and wholesome snack option crafted from organic yellow corn and seasoned to perfection. Made with care and attention to quality, these tortilla chips offer a satisfying crunch and authentic flavor that's sure to please your taste buds. These tortilla chips are made from certified organic yellow corn, providing a classic taste and texture that pairs well with your favorite dips or salsa. Each chip is seasoned with just the right amount of sea salt, enhancing the natural flavor of the corn and creating a deliciously satisfying snack experience. Certified organic and free from artificial flavors, preservatives, and synthetic colors, Simply Nature Organic Yellow Corn Tortilla Chips are a wholesome choice for health-conscious consumers. Plus, they're gluten-free and non-GMO, making them suitable for a variety of dietary preferences. Whether enjoyed on their own as a crunchy snack or paired with your favorite salsa, guacamole, or dip, Simply Nature Organic Yellow Corn Tortilla Chips offer a flavorful and nutritious option for any occasion. Treat yourself to the wholesome goodness of organic yellow corn with these delicious tortilla chips – a snack you can feel good about enjoying.

product_description: Who are we? Well, we seek out the finest natural and organic foods available, maintain the strictest quality standards in the industry, and have an unshakeable commitment to sustainable agriculture. We ban 300+ ingredients from all food that we sell, including hydrogenated fats, high-fructose corn syrup and sweeteners such as aspartame, sucralose and saccharin, so you can skip deciphering ingredient labels and cut to relishing your finds. Our 365 by Whole Foods Market brand offers over 2,500 affordably priced and thoughtfully sourced products that not only meet our already strict standards, but also in many cases go above and beyond what we require of other brands.

name: LOVE CORN Sea Salt | Delicious Crunchy Corn Natural Snack | 4 Ounce x 1 Bag | Non-GMO, Low-Sugar, Gluten-Free, Plant Based, Vegan, Low Sugar
short_description: DELICIOUS CRUNCHY CORN: A better-for-you savory snack made with simple ingredients, bold flavors, and a perfect crunch. A great swap for chips, pretzels, crackers, sunflower seeds & corn nuts. “Your New Favorite Snack!”
SIMPLE INGREDIENTS: Made with whole crunchy corn kernels (right off the cob), sunflower oil, and seasoning. Let’s be honest, sometimes less is more!

SUITABLE FOR ALL DIETS: A low calorie, low sugar, NON-GMO, kosher, gluten free & vegan certified plant-based snack. Popular snack in the Mediterranean & South American diet - “delicioso quicos & kikos!”

LUNCHBOX LOVE: A fan favorite amongst busy adults, always-hungry teens and picky little eaters! Perfect for on-the-go commuters, lunchboxes, after sports, road trips, office snacks, and in between meals. “Kids Love, Dad Obsessed, Mom Approved!”

ENTERTAINING & CRUNCHY TOPPER: Add some LOVE to your next party - pairs perfectly with beer & wine. Your movie night snacks are officially set! Sprinkle on salads or soups as a substitute for croutons. Add some crunch to your cheese or charcuterie board. The “Crunchiest Snack Ever!”

WHAT’S YOUR FLAVOR?: Enjoy Classic Sea Salt, Cheezy, BBQ, Salt & Vinegar or Hot & Spicy. Everyone has a favorite - what will yours be? Ideal as a gift for friends & family or for crunching on your own. There’s no judgment here.

OUR LOVE STORY: In life and in snacks, it’s all about finding love in the little things! LOVE CORN was founded around the family kitchen table with the goal of creating the ultimate feel-good, delicious snack with a mission to do good through business and make customers smile... one kernel at a time!
